remarks: The restriction of the category of categories to a subset is the category of categories in the subset.  Thus, the ` CatCat `` U ` categories for different ` U ` are full subcategories of each other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
resscatc.c $e |- C = ( CatCat ` U ) $.
resscatc.d $e |- D = ( CatCat ` V ) $.
resscatc.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. W ) $.
resscatc.2 $e |- ( ph -> V C_ U ) $.
resscatc $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Homf ` ( C |`s V ) ) = ( Homf ` D ) /\ ( comf ` ( C |`s V ) ) = ( comf ` D ) ) ) $.
